name: Bad Parking
description:
Collect the cash outside the doors of "Big Bank" and take the money to the back of the getaway van. You may have to drop some of the cash to cross the street fast enough to not get ran over by traffic! 

Control the robber using WASD, arrow keys, or with a D pad on a standard controller. R key is used to restart the game ("Y" on a controller). Space button or E key is used to drop some of the collected loot allowing the player to run faster! (Spacebar, "A" on controller).

NOTE: It has been noted that this game (and likely other GODOT 4 Beta Web games) do not function on all web browsers. I have tested it on Chrome, Opera and Edge with success. Firefox on the other hand did not work. Additionally particle effects do not work in the web version. 

BAD PARKING was made for TriJam #195 and was made in 5 hours, two full hours beyond the 3 hour limit! Guess I just couldn't "cut my loses" on a few features. 

Sound was created in Chiptone and 1BitDragon.
